name: Wormhole Escape
description:
In a far 2D future, your crew decides to take the risk of traversing through a worm hole in order to escape hostile pursuers. In order to survive, you have to navigate through a space of unconventional laws, using only your ship thrusters

Use SPACE in order to advance and ESC in order to pause.

Also, seems like collisions do not work in the browser version, so for the full experience, please download the game.
